title: Bug 6009: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using build 20011106, and having a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button, selecting 'Enclosing Type' option, the field is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click on the new class button.
3. Select the 'Enclosing Type' option.
4. Observe that the field is blank instead of defaulting to the current type in the editor.
